name: Council of Birds; Dagger and Chain - Revelations
name_original: Council of Birds; Dagger and Chain - Revelations
description:
Made for the Mix And Game Jam 2020

You are a servant of the Council of Birds and you have to feed the Birds , so they shall have mercy and spare you.

The game is a physics platformer * visual novel

You collect spiders in the old castle and feed them to the birds to survive longer .

in the Platforming part of the game you have a dagger and a chain to move. 

Enter the portal before the timer runs out.
